label: A_hR2_166_c-001
title: $\alpha$-As ($A7$) Structure
comments:
We use the data from (Schiferl, 1969) taken at 78K. 
 When $c/a = \sqrt{6}$ and $z_{1} = 1/8$ this becomes the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF8_227_a-001}{diamond ($A4$) structure}. 
 Note that \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR2_166_c-001}{$\alpha$-As ($A7$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR2_166_c-002}{rhombohedral graphite} (A\_hR2\_166\_c), and \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR2_166_c-003}{$\beta$-O} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A\_hR2\_166\_c. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. Hexagonal settings of rhombohedral structures can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
